mapper.sql: id, courseId, sectionName, sectionSort, isAccept, fileUrl, createDate, status, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gk_video_section ( courseId, sectionName, sectionSort, isAccept, fileUrl, createDate, status, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier ) VALUES ( #{courseId}, #{sectionName}, #{sectionSort}, #{isAccept}, #{fileUrl}, #{createDate}, #{status}, #{creator}, #{lastModDate}, #{lastModifier} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE gk_video_section
courseId = #{courseId},
sectionName = #{sectionName},
sectionSort = #{sectionSort},
isAccept = #{isAccept},
fileUrl = #{fileUrl},
createDate = #{createDate},
status = #{status},
creator = #{creator},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE gk_video_section
courseId = #{map.courseId},
sectionName = #{map.sectionName},
sectionSort = #{map.sectionSort},
isAccept = #{map.isAccept},
fileUrl = #{map.fileUrl},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
status = #{map.status},
creator = #{map.creator},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gk_video_section ( courseId, sectionName, sectionSort, isAccept, fileUrl, createDate, status, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier ) VALUES ( #{map.courseId}, #{map.sectionName}, #{map.sectionSort}, #{map.isAccept}, #{map.fileUrl}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.status}, #{map.creator}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gk_video_section
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND courseId like CONCAT('%', #{courseId} , '%')
AND sectionName like CONCAT('%', #{sectionName} , '%')
AND sectionSort like CONCAT('%', #{sectionSort} , '%')
AND isAccept like CONCAT('%', #{isAccept} , '%')
AND fileUrl like CONCAT('%', #{fileUrl} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
